text: Round Midnight is a 1986 American French musical drama movie directed by Bertrand Tavernier and was based on the memoir Dance of the Infidels by Francis Paudras. It stars Dexter Gordon, François Cluzet, Gabrielle Haker, Sandra Reaves-Phillips, Lonette McKee, Christine Pascal, Herbie Hancock, Bobby Hutcherson, Liliane Rovère, Pierre Trabaud, Martin Scorsese, Wayner Shorter, Philippe Noiret and was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1987. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 musical movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French musical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Tavernier
title: Round Midnight
